game.name: Royal Dental
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Rise from peasant dentist to royal healer in this quirky medieval dental simulation RPG. Treat patients, upgrade tools, improve your clinic, expand your knowledge, and restore Princess Penelope’s legendarily awful smile, all while facing sabotage from a jealous prince.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rise from peasant dentist to royal healer in this quirky medieval dental simulation RPG. Treat patients, upgrade tools, improve your clinic, expand your knowledge, and restore Princess Penelope’s legendarily awful smile, all while facing sabotage from a jealous prince.
